runs.comm: down the pitch straight away and pushes comfortably to long-on
well, that was odd...took the pad down the leg side but didn't really seem as though Kieswetter was playing a shot yet the leg-bye is given
pushed back to the power
power and placement from Pietersen, gets down to sweep and picks the gap wide of deep square
through the leg side again, from outside off stump, but more of a hoick this time which goes through midwicket
fired in quickly at leg stump, Kieswetter comes down the pitch but it takes the pad to the leg side
starts with a full delivery outside off which Pietersen drives sweetly but straight to cover
drags the length back a touch, Pietersen punches firmly towards mid-off and sets off straight away. Misbah not entirely happy with his fielder
beaten by movement back off the surface and a lack of bounce. Scoots past the inside edge and only just misses the off stump
on off stump, Kieswetter gets a stride in and defends back to the bowler
back of a length, Kieswetter comes at the bowler then pulls slightly ungainly through midwicket an deep square does the fielding
nearly drags this one on, looking to guide it down to third and gets a bottom edge that flies over leg stump to short fine-leg
starts full and is picked up over wide mid-on by Kieswetter but it wasn't out of the middle and only gets half way to the boundary
gets more power behind this one, real intent from Kieswetter as he uses his feet then clubs it through straight midwicket
shot! Wonderful clean strike straight down the ground. Kieswetter on the charge as he charges Gul then drives him over long-off
good response, gets the yorker right and it's jabbed to the off side
backs outside leg stump to give himself room, he middles the drive but picks out cover
good leg-stump yorker to finish with which is blocked into the covers
following that delay, plenty of action. Kieswetter would have been run out if Cheema had hit the stumps from his follow through after KP edged the ball into his pads
another inside edge past the stumps to short fine-leg as he aims to go through the covers
picks out the fielder, yard either side of midwicket and that was four as Pietersen swung hard at a good-length delivery.
beaten as he aims a flat-footed drive through the off side...good stuff from Cheema
back of a length outside off, driven on the up to the left of cover who misses with his shy at the stumps...Kieswetter looked safe
another one is poorly timed as Pietersen aims to the leg side and it dribbles through midwicket
down the track then flipped through square leg
down the leg side, clips the pad so escapes a wide call

top catch! That was very well taken at long on. Kieswetter looked to have struck it cleanly but it didn't quite have the legs. Shoaib Malik ran around the boundary then took it sliding on his knees near the rope
full at the stumps and worked to midwicket
he shows Kieswetter how to do it, picks the gap perfectly wide of long-on and didn't try to hit it too hard
aims to the leg side but gets a leading edge down the ground to long-off
offers some width outside off, Pietersen drives and gets a thick edge down to third man
blocked into the off side and he's off the mark
slammed to mid-off where Gul fumbles the stop otherwise Pietersen was going to struggle to complete that single.
gone! Cheema deserved that for a probing spell. Bopara drove and got a thick edge which Umar Akmal took sharply diving to his right. He's dropped easier ones than that
worked into the leg side through midwicket
back of a length on off stump, Pietersen opens the face and guides down to third man
down the track, in the air into the leg side, placed to perfection between long on and deep midwicket, one bounce to the rope
skip down and drive back to the bowler
cut out to deep point with a back to leg
tuck through midwicket and they refuse two as the fielder comes quickly off the boundary
full just outside off and clipped to long on
down the pitch and taken from outside off to leg, this time they do get two as long on can't come up quickly enough
tossed up outside off but hammered straight at the fielder
hammered again, this time from a half-volley outside off but again only right at the fielder at extra cover
dug out down the ground to long off
full and driven off an inside edge to long on
step down the track and driven, sharply fielded by the bowler to his left
chipped down the ground but long off can't come in quick enough, lands a yard in from of him
off the pad to short third man, the return is awful, pas the keeper and into the leg side for an over throw
down the pitch, meets a leg stump ball on the full and drives not wide enough of long on for two
length on off stump and pushed back tot he bowler
down the track, cut missed but Akmal misses it and a missed stumping. Morgan was stranded but a terrible miss after a canny bit of bowling
length and tucked out on the leg side
down the track, dragged down, Pietersen adjusts and punches down to long on
down the track and driven to long off
down the track again, met on the full and driven to long on
leg stump, Pietersen gets in a spot of both and it's pushed down the ground, and yet races away and beats the dive of the deep fielder, remarkable
slapped to extra cover, a misfield, and trouble...Morgan run out. Pietersen took three steps down the wicket and then sent Morgan back and he was stranded, no need for the third umpire
off stump and clipped to point
pushed into the off side again off the stumps
forward and dropped into the covers for a sharp run
cry for leg before as Pietersen sweeps and misses, outside leg
down the track, dragged in and hits Pietersen on the body
length on leg stump and clipped out through square
full again on leg stump and clipped to the 45
tucked through square leg again
full outside off and flicked to point
a good legger, turn away from the forward push
length and tucked through midwicket
steps away to cut and a bottom edge goes under the legs of Akmal and races away to the rope, very fortunate
lifted from outside off between the men in the deep, nice controlled stroke
full, opened the face to point
sharp offie first up nearly gets through the backing-away Bairstow...

this offie gets past the attempted cut and takes out off stump. So no young-gunning from Jonny Boy today, backing away once more, trying to cut and done by one that squirts under the bat and onto off stump
another offie, full and defended forward
soft hands and dropped down to third man on the front foot
full on leg stump and flicked behind square on the leg side
outside off and pushed into the off side coming forward
turning leggie and a big swing misses outside off
googly this time and angled to leg
driven into the covers with a little push from the crease
angled to leg stump and blocked forward
sharp legger, snaps away from Buttler's poke on off stump
full outside off and bottom-edged back to the bowler
length darts back and catches Pietersen on the thigh guard. That nipped back off a crack
Pietersen across his stumps and the ball misses the leg stump by an inch, called wide
Pietersen moving in his crease again and Gul fires it down the leg side and shovels it miles down leg and away for five wides
length on off stump and slapped to extra cover, hasn't found that gap past extra cover today KP
middle and leg, off an inside edge through square leg playing forward
outside off and chopped down to third man where Afridi fields but has to go to his right a little so can't save two
a fine nut right up in the blockhole
tries to turn a full ball to leg, comes off an outside edge and falls just short of mid off, they take a run
off spinner into the legs and angled into the off side
doosra that beats Pietersen outside off
down the track and blocked to midwicket
fired in full and quicker and Buttler tries to sweep and misses, struck low on the pad and given out leg before as Buttler falls over, another slightly ungainly ending for the young lad
full and tucked to midwicket
back and edged back to the bowler
full outside off and driven out to deep cover
back and pushed past extra cover wide enough of the cover sweeper to bring two
driven to mid off's right on the front foot
outside off and cut over point towards the square boundary, the sweeper comes round to field
full outside off and driven with lovely timing to long off's left
from the crease dropped in front of point
step away and cut in front of square, long chase for deep point who scrambles well to save two
down the ground and six! Fine strike, straight over the bowler's head, delightfully timed
another slap attempted, this time an inside edge past the keeper and it races away to the fine leg fence
full outside off, swung at giving himself a little room, missed
but gone this time coming down the track and swinging and missing, easy stumping that my mother could have completed, so even a gimmie for Akmal
forward on off stump and blocked back to the bowler
outside off, clipped into the off side and they take a run to bring up KP's 50
middle and leg and clipped down the ground
Pietersen gives himself room again and clubs it down to long on
full on middle and punched down the long on
more room for KP, again Gul responds by going wider but too wide now and an extra
fine yorker angled to middle and leg, dug out back to the bowler
full again and slapped wide of long on for four, great shot, very well timed, managing to get underneath the full delivery, once again the placement was exceptional
full outside off and dabbed to point
full and cracked down to long off
full outside off and chipped over extra cover, long off comes round
slower ball, again outside off, this deceives Broad who cuts over it, fumbled by Akmal but just about saves the bye
full, dug out down the ground

oh dear an awful finish from Cheema, getting it all wrong. A waist-high full toss is smashed over midwicket into the terraces. Pietersen holds the pose like a baseball batter and walks off to the applause
